Desc.entry: A local registered charity run by parents and friends of deaf and hearing impaired children (aged 0-18 years) living in Sheffield, Rotherham, Chesterfield and the surrounding areas of South Yorkshire. The aim of the group is to offer advice and mutual support, encourage information exchange and to have fun with lots of inclusive social activities and outings. Details of meetings are posted on the website. Runs 3 clubs: Little Ears for pre-school hearing impaired children; Under 10s club and soft play; Super Stars youth club for aged 11 years and over.

Address.entry: c/o The Centre For Hearing And Speech
